cards.title: Panicked Pilot
cards.text: Gain 2 stress tokens. Then repair this card.

cards.title: Blinded Pilot
cards.text: While you perform an attack, you can modify your dice only by spending [Force] for their default effect. Action: Repair this card.

cards.title: Wounded Pilot
cards.text: After you perform an action, roll 1 attack die. On a [Hit] or [Critical Hit] result, gain 1 stress token. Action: Repair this card.

cards.title: Stunned Pilot
cards.text: After you execute a maneuver, if you moved through or overlapped an obstacle, suffer 1 [Hit] damage.

cards.title: Console Fire
cards.text: Before you engage, roll 1 attack die. On a [Hit] result, suffer 1 [Hit] damage. Action: Repair this card.

cards.title: Damaged Engine
cards.text: Increase the difficulty of you turn maneuvers ([Turn Left] and [Turn Right]).

cards.title: Weapons Failure
cards.text: While you perform an attack, roll 1 fewer attack die. Action: Repair this card.

cards.title: Hull Breach
cards.text: Before you would suffer 1 or more [Hit] damage, suffer that much [Critical Hit] damage instead. Action: Repair this card.

cards.title: Structural Damage
cards.text: While you defend, roll 1 fewer defense die.

cards.title: Damaged Sensor Array
cards.text: You cannot perform any actions except the [Focus] action and actions from damage cards. Action: Repair this card.

cards.title: Loose Stabilizer
cards.text: After you execute a non-straight maneuver ([Straight]), suffer 1 [Hit] damage and repair this card. Action: Repair this card.

cards.title: Disabled Power Regulator
cards.text: Before you engage, gain 1 ion token. After you execute an ion maneuver, repair this card.

cards.title: Fuel Leak
cards.text: After you suffer 1 [Critical Hit] damage, suffer 1 [Hit] damage and repair this card. Action: Repair this card.

cards.title: Direct Hit!
cards.text: Suffer 1 [Hit] damage. Then repair this card.
